# WeMow760

> Professional lawn care and yard services proudly serving Ridgecrest, CA and the surrounding 760 area code region. Family-owned and operated by Thomas.

## About

WeMow760 is a locally owned, family-operated lawn care business based in Ridgecrest, California. We serve homeowners and residents across the 760 area code with reliable, professional yard care. We are fully insured and have earned 5-star reviews from our customers on Google.

## Services

- **Landscaping**: Full-service landscaping including design, planting, mulching, and seasonal cleanups.
- **Lawn Mowing**: Clean, even cuts with professional-grade equipment. Height adjusted for season and turf type.
- **Edging**: Crisp, defined lines along sidewalks, driveways, and flower beds.
- **Shrub Trimming**: Neat, shaped hedges and bushes to keep properties looking well-maintained.

## Service Area

- Ridgecrest, CA
- 760 area code region
- Kern County, California

## Key Details

- Family-owned and operated
- Fully insured
- Free estimates with no obligation
- 5-star rated on Google
- Serving military families and residents in the high desert community
